name: EDD Free Download Text
author: Easy Digital Downloads

sections.description:
This plugin requires Easy Digital Downloads.

It adds a new option under Downloads → Settings → Misc → Button Text where you can change the text that is shown for free downloads. The default is “Free – Purchase” which is not always ideal.
sections.installation:
1. Unpack the entire contents of this plugin zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder locally
  2. Upload to your site
  3. Navigate to wp-admin/plugins.php on your site (your WP Admin plugin page)
  4. Activate this plugin
  5. Configure the text from Downloads → Settings → Misc → Button Text → Free Download Text

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin’s name
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Tweak: Moved free_download_text() method to earlier filter for better compatibility

1.0.1

  • Tweak: Update plugin information
  • Tweak: Move setting to Downloads → Settings → Misc → Button Text

1.0

  • Initial release

  4. Activate this plugin
  5. Configure the text from Downloads → Settings → Misc → Button Text → Free Download Text

OR you can just install it with WordPress by going to Plugins >> Add New >> and type this plugin’s name

short_description: Change the button text of a free download
description:
This plugin requires Easy Digital Downloads.

It adds a new option under Downloads → Settings → Misc → Button Text where you can change the text that is shown for free downloads. The default is “Free – Purchase” which is not always ideal.
